description: Character registry for German Learning App content. Only characters with visual definitions are available for content creation.

primary.description: Default characters for 2-person dialogues. Use these FIRST for all basic scenarios.

Eli.role: Professional German teacher, calm and supportive

primary.usageRule: ALWAYS use Eli & Tom when only 2 people are needed

secondary.description: Use for youth/casual scenarios or when 3rd/4th person is needed.

Lisa.role: Young companion, represents youth culture and casual speech

Alex.role: German student, flexible for many dialogue situations

secondary.usageRule: Use Lisa/Alex for youth scenarios or when more than 2 people needed

service.description: Generic role names for service scenarios (not named characters, no visual needed).
service.usageRule: Use role titles instead of names for brief service interactions

future.description: Characters reserved for future use. DO NOT use until visual definitions are created.
future.note: These names are reserved but not yet available for content creation

selection.threePersonScene: Use Eli, Tom + Lisa or Alex
selection.youthScene: Use Lisa and/or Alex for casual youth scenarios
selection.serviceInteraction: Use role titles (Kellner, etc.) instead of names

A1.note: Only use characters with visual definitions

A2.note: More characters will be added when visual definitions are created

B1.note: Expand roster as more characters get visual definitions

validationRules.description: Fail if character name not in available list
Fail if using a reserved (future) character name
Warn if more than 4 characters in a scene
